column5: I was just sitting here reading OFC when two cops and a police dog ran through my front yard and up the road.  Wonder what they could be searching for?  How exciting.  The dog is on a LONG leash and they keep letting him get a whiff then he takes off fast again and they keep running as fast as they can after it.  Interesting - better lock my door.  Joey
With any luck he chewed on whoever it was he was chasing after!!
Quick hide the Mary Jane!!!! LOL  Gerritt.
Grow up yourself, and see how you like it, but not intended at Clampet.  ( I am just trying to sound edgy and clever here, a little help ? ).
I heard an escaped lunatic with a hook for a hand was roaming the area looking for hitch-hikers. jk
Wonder if he knows how to cook  Joey
boy if they are still lookin for me then they are a longgggggg way off the trail....   Art
If he comes home with dog bite marks then you're in trouble Joey....hehe
I was wondering the same thing
YOU WILL NEVER TAKE ME ALIVE,YOU ROTTEN COPPERS!! I believe Cagney
LOL..   How many time in one thread can people say... wheres paul... lol  .... goodnite.... hahahahaha
